ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL1_BODY: You learn something for completing the first level.
ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL2_BODY: You learn something for completing the second level.
ACHIEVEMENT_LEVEL3_BODY: You learn something for completing the third level.
HELP_BLAST: Touch the Fire button or press the space bar to blast crystals off planetoids.
HELP_MIGHTY: Firing does not affect the mighty Sinistar.
HELP_PICK: Pick up crystals to fill bombbay with Sinibombs.
HELP_RUN: Workers collect crystals to build Sinistar. Once the Sinistar is built you must destroy it or you had better run!
HELP_SINIBOMBS: Only Sinibombs can affect this nemesis. Touch the Sinibomb button or press the Ctrl key to launch.
HELP_START: Touch the coin to start a game.
